poem:
Title: "Flame on Embassy Steps"

On Washington's cold axis, fired in protest,
A phoenix, not for rebirth - death's urgent guest. 
Israeli pavements hotter than Qatar sun,
Gaza's echoes in a silence undone.
Amidst the split, a PM's hollow seat. 
A call for aid, a heart that skips a beat-
Decipher this, in paper ink's embrace,
Humanity's worst riddle drawn on face.
